snippet: A combination of allied Special Operations forces and Afghan troops are set to assume more responsibility in Afghanistan as NATO gradually hands over security operations.
abstract: American Special Operations forces and Afghan troops are training together in preparation for assuming large share of security burden in Afghanistan as NATO gradually hands over responsibility; change has involved intense preparation as well as change in culture of Special Operations forces, which are transitioning to supervisory and collaborative role.
lead_paragraph: A combination of allied Special Operations forces and Afghan troops are set to assume more responsibility in Afghanistan as NATO gradually hands over security operations.
